forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight settles over Downtown San Francisco, the skies hold a gentle veil of clouds, ushering in a tranquil evening. The temperature hovers around a mild 54 degrees, accompanied by a soft breeze whispering in from the west. The atmosphere feels serene, hinting at the typical coolness that drapes the city at night. In the morning light, however, a promise of sunshine emerges, clearing the way for a day bathed in warmth—a high gently reaching into the 64-degree range before gracefully easing into the afternoon chill.

As the new day unfolds, anticipate a landscape where the sun plays peekaboo with the remaining cloud cover, a brief gift of clarity amidst the evolving skies. While pockets of fog may linger along the edges of the bay, the core of the city remains bright, ideal for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or an exploration of the vibrant local cafés. Dressing in layers will be key; a light jacket will provide comfort against the briskness of the wind while still allowing room to breathe amid the rising warmth of midday. And as you sip your morning coffee or take a gentle walk, allow the moment to relax your spirit, embracing the city's unique blend of urban charm and natural beauty.
